description: A 39-year old man from Somerset, Kentucky, was sentenced to 81 months in federal prison for identity theft and faking his own death in government registry systems. [...]
title: Man sentenced for hacking state registry to fake his own death

description: ​​Today, Google released a new Chrome emergency security update to patch a zero-day vulnerability, the ninth one exploited in attacks this year. [...]
title: Google fixes ninth Chrome zero-day exploited in attacks this year

description: Threat actors started to use progressive web applications to impersonate banking apps and steal credentials from Android and iOS users. [...]
title: Hackers steal banking creds from iOS, Android users via PWA apps

description: Microsoft announced today that it will start rolling out its AI-powered Windows Recall feature to Insiders with Copilot+ PCs in October. [...]
title: Microsoft to roll out Windows Recall to Insiders in October

description: Microsoft announced today that it will start rolling out its AI-powered Windows Recall feature to Insiders with Copilot+ PCs in October. [...]
title: Microsoft to rollout Windows Recall to Insiders in October

description: ​Taiwanese hardware vendor QNAP has added a Security Center with ransomware protection capabilities to the latest version of its QTS operating system for network-attached storage (NAS) devices. [...]
title: QNAP adds NAS ransomware protection to latest QTS version

description: A critical vulnerability in the LiteSpeed Cache WordPress plugin can let attackers take over millions of websites after creating rogue admin accounts. [...]
title: Litespeed Cache bug exposes millions of WordPress sites to takeover attacks

description: Phrack #71 has been released online and is available to read for free. This issue is the first to be released since 2021, marking a new chapter in the influential online magazine's history. [...]
title: Phrack hacker zine publishes new edition after three years

description: A critical vulnerability affecting multiple versions of GitHub Enterprise Server could be exploited to bypass authentication and enable an attacker to gain administrator privileges on the machine. [...]
title: GitHub Enterprise Server vulnerable to critical auth bypass flaw
